description: President Trump will withdraw the United States from the first worldwide deal to address global warming. Where do other countries stand on the agreement?
title: The Stakes in the Paris Climate Deal: What Might Other Countries Do?
title_page: The Stakes in the Paris Climate Deal: What Might Other Countries Do? - The New York Times
maintext: Concern has risen over how much India, the third-largest polluter, and other developing countries will be able to do without financial support. India, Brazil, South Africa, and China have asked that developed nations “honor their commitments” to give $100 billion a year. President Trump has said he will cut payments to United Nations climate programs.
